Mahindra Manulife Multi Cap Fund.investment_objective: The investment objective of the Scheme is to provide medium to long term capital appreciation through appropriate diversication and taking low risk on business quality. The diversied portfolio would predominantly consist of equity and equity related securities including derivatives. However, there can be no assurance that the investment objective of the Scheme will be achieved.

However, there is no assurance that the objective of the Scheme will be realized.

portfolio_information: *In case of semi annual YTM, it will be annualised
Note: As per AMFI guidelines for factsheet, the ratios are
calculated based on month rolling returns for last 3 years.

Mahindra Manulife Liquid Fund.investment_objective: The Scheme seeks to deliver reasonable market related returns with lower risk and higher liquidity through a portfolio of money market and debt instruments. However, there is no assurance that the investment objective of the Scheme will be realized and the Scheme does not assure or guarantee any returns.
Mahindra Manulife Liquid Fund.scheme_details.benchmark: CRISIL Liquid Debt A-I Index Available Plans for subscription by investors Direct (Default) and Regular Available
Mahindra Manulife Liquid Fund.scheme_details.option: s under each plan Growth (Default) and IDCW Available Facilities under IDCW Option IDCW Reinvestment (Daily (Default) and Weekly )

Exit Load Investor Exit upon Exit Load as  of subscription redemption proceed Day 1 0.0070 Day 2 0.0065 Day 3 0.0060 Day 4 0.0055 Day 5 0.0050 Day 6 0.0045 Day 7 onwards 0.0000 Redemption Switch-Out of Units would be done on First in First out Basis (FIFO). The above mentioned exit load shall not apply to the Unclaimed Plan offered under the scheme.

The above mentioned exit load shall not apply to the Unclaimed Plan offered under the scheme.

Mahindra Manulife Low Duration Fund.investment_objective: The investment objective of the Scheme is to provide reasonable returns, commensurate with a low to moderate level of risk and high degree of liquidity, through a portfolio constituted of money market and debt instruments. However, there is no assurance that the investment objective of the Scheme will be realized and the Scheme does not assure or guarantee any returns.
Mahindra Manulife Low Duration Fund.scheme_details.benchmark: CRISIL Low Duration Debt A-I Index Available Plans for subscription by investors Direct (Default) and Regular Available
Mahindra Manulife Low Duration Fund.scheme_details.option: s under each plan Growth (Default) and IDCW Available Facilities under IDCW Option IDCW Reinvestment (Daily (Default), Weekly, Monthly), IDCW Payout (Monthly)
Mahindra Manulife Low Duration Fund.scheme_details.total_expense_ratio: 1 Regular Plan 1.09 as on Dec 31, 2024 Direct Plan 0.30
Mahindra Manulife Low Duration Fund.scheme_details.load_structure: Entry Load N.A. Exit Load Nil
portfolio_information: *In case of semi annual YTM, it will be annualised

Mahindra Manulife Dynamic Bond Fund.investment_objective: The investment objective of the Scheme is to generate regular returns and capital appreciation through an active management of a portfolio constituted of money market and debt instruments across duration. However, there is no assurance that the investment objective of the Scheme will be realized and the Scheme does not assure or guarantee any returns.
Mahindra Manulife Dynamic Bond Fund.scheme_details.benchmark: CRISIL Dynamic Bond A-III Index Minimum Application  Additional Purchase Rs. 1,000 and in multiples of Re. 1- thereafter. Minimum Amount for Switch in Rs. 1,000- and in multiples of Re. 0.01- thereafter. Minimum Amount for Redemption  Switch-outs Rs. 1,000- or 100 units or account balance, whichever is lower in respect of each

Mahindra Manulife Overnight Fund.investment_objective: The primary objective of the Scheme is to seek to generate returns commensurate with low risk and providing high level of liquidity, through investments made primarily in overnight securities having maturity of 1 business day including TREPS (Tri-Party Repo) and Reverse Repo. However, there is no assurance or guarantee that the investment objective of the scheme will be achieved.
Mahindra Manulife Overnight Fund.scheme_details.option: s under each plan Growth(D) and IDCW (Daily IDCW Reinvestment), D-Default
Mahindra Manulife Overnight Fund.scheme_details.total_expense_ratio: 1 Regular Plan 0.19 as on Dec 31, 2024 Direct Plan 0.09
portfolio_information: *In case of semi annual YTM, it will be annualised

Mahindra Manulife Ultra Short Duration F.investment_objective: The investment objective of the Scheme is to generate regular income and capital appreciation through investment in a portfolio of short term debt & money market instruments such that the Macaulay duration of the portfolio is between 3 - 6 months. However, there is no assurance or guarantee that the investment objective of the Scheme will be achieved. The Scheme does not assure or guarantee any returns.
Mahindra Manulife Ultra Short Duration F.scheme_details.benchmark: CRISIL Ultra Short Duration Debt A-I Index Available Plans for subscription by investors Direct (Default) and Regular Available
Mahindra Manulife Ultra Short Duration F.scheme_details.option: s under each plan Growth (Default) and IDCW Available Facilities under IDCW Option Daily IDCW Reinvestment (Default), Weekly IDCW Reinvestment
Mahindra Manulife Ultra Short Duration F.scheme_details.total_expense_ratio: 1 Regular Plan 0.69 as on Dec 31, 2024 Direct Plan 0.27
Mahindra Manulife Ultra Short Duration F.scheme_details.load_structure: Entry Load Nil Exit Load Nil
portfolio_information: *In case of semi annual YTM, it will be annualised

Mahindra Manulife Short Duration Fund.investment_objective: The investment objective of the Scheme is to generate income and capital appreciation through an actively managed diversied portfolio of Debt & Money Market instruments such that the Macaulay duration of the portfolio is between 1 year to 3 years. However, there is no assurance or guarantee that the investment objective of the Scheme will be achieved. The Scheme does not assure or guarantee any returns.
